Text.p: On coding for Station Depart, by selecting [ip]Launch[/pi] from the command console, the pilot is advised to accept a 10-second MemnSomn to dispense with subjective experience of the passage from docking bay to Coriolis station egress. The screen will then show a break-pattern, which is the passage through the protective field over the Coriolis entrance tunnel.

Image.name: leaving_lave
Image.Text: Leaving a Coriolis station and approaching the planet, Lave.
